statements: DELETE FROM sports_events WHERE event_name = 'Football Match';
DELETE FROM sports_events WHERE winner = 'Team A';
DELETE FROM sports_events WHERE event_id = 10 AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sports_events WHERE winner IS NULL;
DELETE FROM sports_events WHERE location LIKE '%Stadium%' AND event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM event_results WHERE event_id = 1 AND winning_score < 100;
DELETE FROM event_results WHERE event_id = 1 AND winner_team = 'Team A';
DELETE FROM sports_events WHERE event_id IN (SELECT event_id FROM event_results WHERE winner_team = 'Team B');
DELETE FROM event_participants WHERE participant_id = 2005 AND event_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM event_results WHERE result_id = 3002 AND event_id = 1001 AND participant_id = 2005;
DELETE FROM results WHERE winning_team_id IS NULL;
DELETE FROM event_statistics WHERE event_id = 5 AND participant_id = 10;
